body_html:
Its great that it works. Thank you for trying it out @maxnbk. --distinct_host_configuration=false flag is fine so long as your target is same as current platform.

Thank you @meteorcloudy for investigating and opening a bazel bug!

It would be nice if it worked without that flag. I want to look at skipping this genrule during build (instead submitting some data that it generates). So, I will keep this issue open.

body:
Its great that it works. Thank you for trying it out @maxnbk. --distinct_host_configuration=false flag is fine so long as your target is same as current platform.

Thank you @meteorcloudy for investigating and opening a bazel bug!

It would be nice if it worked without that flag. I want to look at skipping this genrule during build (instead submitting some data that it generates). So, I will keep this issue open.
